title: 12-4-17 Mary (Marney) Hertel, Kathleen Berlew, Kristin Esser, and Lesley Chaisson Chat with Pat on Pat Sloan's Talk show for American Patchwork and Quilting Radio
description:
Marney Hertel writes at Made by Marney where she shares her darling paper pieced designs! 
-------------
Kathleen Berlew is a designer that writes at kbbcrafts and her work is showcased in many of the Quilts & More issues, like her heart pillow in the summer 2017 issue & the awesome ocean scene the Winter 2018 issue of the magazine.  She works in felt and I’m excited to chat with her about how we can use felt!
----------
I love Kristin Esser’s book with her co-author Minki Kim called ‘Sew Illustrated’. You’ll also recognize her cover quilt from the Summer 2017 Quilts & more .. how many of you have pulled fabric to make it (I raise my hand!) Kristin has some great tips for getting that gradation of color from your stash.
-------------
Lesley Chaisson of Berry Bird is an author, designer, regular contributor to American Patchwork & Quilting family of magazines and an all around maker of things! I love her fun sense of humor with her work, as you’ll recognize her fun pincushions like the Donuts & Hamburger. She has some great tips for us!
